defaultDescription: Explore artists, albums and music on Spotify. Discover new artists, listen to their top tracks and browse complete discographies.
defaultKeywords: spotify, artists, music, albums, discovery, playlist, streaming, international artists
homeDescription: Discover new artists and music on Spotify. Explore complete discographies, listen to top tracks and find your next favorite song.
searchDescription: Search for artists on Spotify. Find musicians by name, genre or popularity. Explore complete discographies and listen to top tracks.
artistDescription: Discover {{artistName}} on Spotify. Listen to top tracks, explore albums and singles, discover the artist's complete discography.
artistKeywords: {{artistName}}, spotify, music, albums, tracks, discography, artist
libraryDescription: Access your personal Spotify library. View saved artists, favorite playlists and liked songs.
createDescription: Create your own playlists on Spotify. Organize your favorite songs and share with friends.
errorDescription: An error occurred while loading the page. Please try again or contact us.
notFoundTitle: Page not found - Spotify Artist Explorer
notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for was not found. Return to home and continue exploring artists on Spotify.
